data.title: Fabio Testi
data.meta_description: Fabio Testi. Actor: Briefe an Julia. From 1955, Fabio Testi's home town Peschiera del Garda was also home to Bertolazzi Film, a motion picture studio which specialised in the production of colourful pirate movies. Lake Garda was merrily used as the ersatz Caribbean. At Bertolazzi, young Fabio began his career first as an extra, then as a stunt man and body double. As a stunt man, he appeared in the...
data.text:
He had a relationship with Ursula Andress and Charlotte Rampling in the 1970s.

Father (with Lola Navarro) of actor Fabio Testi Jr., Tomas and Trini - born before their marriage.

Supporter of the conservative party Popolo della Libert√† (PDL) led by Silvio Berlusconi.
